cell.paragraph: The Eiffel Class Library Project Wizard create a new Eiffel precompiled project that may be used as a precompilelibrary from other Eiffel ENViSioN! projects.
cell.heading: 2Page content
cell.paragraph: To navigate to the desired page, select the page name which is displayed to the left hand side of the window.
To cancel the wizard at any point, select the Cancel button.

To complete the wizard, using the current settings, select the Finish button.
2Navigation
This wizard is comprised of the following pages:
Overview
This page displays the current settings that will be used when Finish is pressed.
System Settings
Import EiffelStudio Wizard precompile_wizard.PNG
By default the precompile project wizard will create a new precompile project using the existing Eiffel Base Class (eBCL) precompile library. You may turn this option off by un-checking the 'Use eBCL precompile?' option. If eBCL is not used then you may select the Eiffel libraries you would like to include in your procompile project via the 'Include Library' list. This page allows you to modify the settings for the system created when the wizard is completed. The following settings may be modified:
Use eBCL precompile? -Reuses the eBCL precompile allowing the new project to build upon in.
Include Library- Allows you to addone or moreexisting Eiffel library to your project. Unchecking Use eBCL precompile will enable this option.
See Also
